titleStmt.title: The ground of Christianitie composed in maner of a dialogue between Paule and Titus, contayning all the principall poyntes of our saluation in Christ.
titleStmt.author: Gee, Alexander.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Robert walde-graue, and are to be sold at the signe of the Beare in Paules Church-yard, by Thomas VVoodcocke,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
